uvi.description:
usb: fix various gadget panics on 10gbps cabling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.237 by commit 70cd19cb5bd94bbb5bacfc9c1e4ee0071699a604. For more details please see the references link.
